description: The Straw Hat Pirates storm the World Government's judicial island of Enies Lobby to rescue Nico Robin from CP9. This arc features the crew's declaration of war against the World Government and Luffy's climactic battle with Rob Lucci.

keyMoments.title: Enies Lobby Destroyed by Buster Call
keyMoments.description: The judicial island is completely obliterated by the Marine Buster Call, leaving only the Bridge of Hesitation standing.
keyMoments.significance: The destruction of a World Government stronghold showcases the extent of their ruthlessness and the high stakes of the conflict.
